title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and select 'Zip File' to export
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name 'foo.txt' under different directories to a zip file in WSWB, the operation fails.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select 'File' -> 'Export' and select 'Zip File' to export
